original_text: There was path between the two rows. They looked the same as the rooms on the north side. The size of the rooms and the entrances were the same as those of the other building.
korean_text: 그 두 방 사이에 길이 있고 그 방들의 모양은 북쪽 방 같고 그 길이와 너비도 같으며 그 출입구와 문도 그와 같으며

sentences.original_text: There was path between the two rows.
They looked the same as the rooms on the north side.
and the entrances were the same
as those of the other building.
